RelatedSentence: Belgium will send an assistance mission to Bosnia - Herzegovina on the request of the authorities in Sarajevo , Belgian deputy Prime Minister Didier Reynders said Sunday , in the wake of recent floods .

Belgium will send an assistance mission to Bosnia - Herzegovina on the request of the authorities in Sarajevo , Belgian deputy Prime Minister Didier Reynders said Sunday , in the wake of recent floods .
